name: Waste Isolation Pilot Plant - Human Deterrent Markers
name_original: Waste Isolation Pilot Plant - Human Deterrent Markers
description:
A concept of the [nuclear] Waste Isolation Pilot Plant human deterrent proposed by Sandia National Laboratories in the 1993 Sandia Report "Expert Judgment on Markers to Deter Inadvertent Human Intrusion into the Waste Isolation Pilot Plant"

Controls:
Movement - W, A, S, D
Jump  - Space
Zoom - Mousewheel

Planned features:

  • Improved quality of currently implemented markers
  • Ambient sounds
  • Other markers detailed in the Sandia Report
  • Scene selection for different layouts
  • Everything else from the report if Sandia National Laboratories or the United States Department of Energy funds me :D
